markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Morlock Cultist](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1039)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Morlocks who serve as priests in their conclaves usually dabble in eerie occult magic.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 21

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 19

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 4">[Morlock Cultist](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1039)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
<trait label="Morlock" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=302" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #163: Ruins of Gauntlight](/Sources.aspx?ID=71) pg. 85</row>

**Perception** +11; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +10, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +11, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +11, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +13, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +11

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +3

**Con** +1

**Int** +5

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +0
</row>

**[Light Blindness](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=22)** 

**Items**
[Club](/Weapons.aspx?ID=2)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 21 

**Fort** +9 

**Ref** +11 

**Will** +11 

+2 status to all saves vs. [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46) and [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)
</row>

**HP** 58

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet, climb 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
club +11,
**Damage** 1d6+5 bludgeoning

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +11 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)),
**Damage** 1d4+5 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
club +13 ([range increment 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 1d6+5 bludgeoning

**Occult Innate Spells** DC 21, attack +13
- **Cantrips (2nd)**
[Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Ghost Sound](/Spells.aspx?ID=132), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280), [Telekinetic Projectile](/Spells.aspx?ID=334)
- **1st**
[Bane](/Spells.aspx?ID=18), [Grim Tendrils](/Spells.aspx?ID=141), [Ray of Enfeeblement](/Spells.aspx?ID=244)
- **2nd**
[Mirror Image](/Spells.aspx?ID=197), [Phantom Pain](/Spells.aspx?ID=220), [Telekinetic Maneuver](/Spells.aspx?ID=333)

**Occult Attack** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The morlock cultist Strides up to half its speed, ignoring difficult terrain caused by natural cavern features like rubble or stalagmites. At any point during its movement, the morlock cultist can Cast a Spell that normally takes two actions or fewer to cast.

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   The morlock deals an extra 1d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

</column>

<aside>
<title level="2" noclass="true" icon="/images/Icons/Sidebar_2_AdditionalLore.png">Morlock Cults</title>

Morlocks led by cultists don't always follow an established religion, in part because their insular background limits contact with the rest of the world. In many cases, a morlock cult worships some figure from the group's past, be it a revered (or more often, feared) ancestor, or even the strange machines or statues left behind from a mysterious civilization that once ruled the place where the morlocks now live.
</aside>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-211" />
name: Morlock Cultist
